com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.name: CDS Med Order

properties.property: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?> <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:urn="urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adapter:fact"> <soap:Body> <storeMedicationFactEvent xmlns="http://dss.kmr.nhinc.fha.hhs.gov/"> <fact> <urn:primaryKey>${patientien}</urn:primaryKey> <urn:historical>false</urn:historical> <urn:id> <urn:codeSystem>IEN</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:value>${patientien}</urn:value> <urn:displayable>false</urn:displayable> </urn:id> <urn:sourceSystem>${message.source}</urn:sourceSystem> <urn:patientId> <urn:codeSystem>IEN</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName></urn:codeSystemName> <urn:value>${patientien}o</urn:value> <urn:displayable>false</urn:displayable> </urn:patientId> <!--type: string--> <urn:freeTextProductName>sceptra tenens</urn:freeTextProductName> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:freeTextBrandName>turbine corripuit scopuloque</urn:freeTextBrandName> <!--Optional:--> <urn:codedProductName> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>flammato secum dea</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>profundum quippe ferant</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>nubibus ignem disiecitque</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>ac vinclis et</urn:label> </urn:codedProductName> <!--Optional:--> <urn:codedBrandName> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>rapidum iaculata e</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>caelumque profundum</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>circum claustra</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>coniunx una</urn:label> </urn:codedBrandName> <urn:productConcentration>circum claustra fremunt</urn:productConcentration> <urn:codedTypeOfMedication> <urn:codeSystem>${drugcodingsystem}</urn:codeSystem> <urn:codeSystemName>${drugcodingsystem}</urn:codeSystemName> <urn:code>${drugid}</urn:code> <urn:label>sed pater</urn:label> </urn:codedTypeOfMedication> <urn:codedStatusOfMedication> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>talia flammato secum</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>austris aeoliam</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>sciret dare</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>dare iussus</urn:label> </urn:codedStatusOfMedication> <urn:sigFreeText>${SIG}t</urn:sigFreeText> <!--Optional:--> <urn:codedSigRoute> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>infixit acuto</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>tenens mollitque animos</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>montis insuper</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>habenas ipsa</urn:label> </urn:codedSigRoute> <!--Optional:--> <urn:sigDose> <!--type: string--> <urn:value>mollitque animos</urn:value> <!--type: string--> <urn:unit>iovisque et</urn:unit> </urn:sigDose> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:sigMedicationStopped>soror et coniunx</urn:sigMedicationStopped> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:freeTextIndication>iunonis adorat</urn:freeTextIndication> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:patientInstructions>adorat praeterea</urn:patientInstructions> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:reaction>illum exspirantem transfixo</urn:reaction> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <urn:sigCodedVehicle> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>aris imponet honorem</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>aris imponet</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>premere et</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>insuper altos</urn:label> </urn:sigCodedVehicle> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:sigDoseIndicator>ferant rapidi secum</urn:sigDoseIndicator> <urn:order> <!--type: string--> <urn:orderNumber>${ordernumber}</urn:orderNumber> <!--type: int--> <urn:fills>3</urn:fills> <!--type: int--> <urn:reFills>${numofrefills}</urn:reFills> <urn:quantityOrdered> <!--type: string--> <urn:value>vasto rex</urn:value> <!--type: string--> <urn:unit>flammato secum</urn:unit> </urn:quantityOrdered> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:orderExpirationDateTime>tempestatesque sonoras</urn:orderExpirationDateTime> <!-- TODO: Deal wth ORC-9/ORC-15 issue --> <urn:orderDateTime>${orderdatetime}</urn:orderDateTime> <!-- TODO: Deal with ORC-12 promoite to OBR-16 --> <urn:orderingProvider> <urn:firstName>${orderingprovfirstname}premit ac</urn:firstName> <urn:middleName>${orderingprovmiddlename}iras ni</urn:middleName> <urn:familyName>${orderingprovlastname}nubibus ignem</urn:familyName> <urn:suffix> <urn:code>${orderingprovfsuffix}</urn:code> <urn:label>${orderingprovfsuffix}</urn:label> </urn:suffix> </urn:orderingProvider> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:fullfillmentInstructions>vinclis et</urn:fullfillmentInstructions> </urn:order> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <urn:fullfillment> <!--type: string--> <urn:prescriptionNumber>${perscriptionnumber}</urn:prescriptionNumber> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:dispensingPharmacy>antro luctantis ventos</urn:dispensingPharmacy> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:dispensingPharmacyLocation>sciret dare</urn:dispensingPharmacyLocation> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:dispenseDate>luctantis ventos</urn:dispenseDate> <urn:quantityDispensed> <!--type: string--> <urn:value>ipsa iovis</urn:value> <!--type: string--> <urn:unit>aris imponet</urn:unit> </urn:quantityDispensed> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: int--> <urn:fillNumber>3</urn:fillNumber> <!--Optional:--> <urn:fillStatus> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystem>imperio premit</urn:codeSystem> <!--Optional:--> <!--type: string--> <urn:codeSystemName>arce sceptra tenens</urn:codeSystemName> <!--type: string--> <urn:code>ni faciat</urn:code> <!--type: string--> <urn:label>circum claustra fremunt</urn:label> </urn:fillStatus> </urn:fullfillment> </fact> </storeMedicationFactEvent> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: eventid
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.10'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('eventid', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: sendingapp
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.3']['HD.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('sendingapp', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: sendingfacility
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['MSH']['MSH.4']['HD.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('sendingfacility', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: patientien
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.PATIENT']['PID']['PID.3']['CX.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('patientien', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: form
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDO_O01.ORDER']['RDO_O01.ORDER_DETAIL']['RXO']['RXO.5']['CE.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('form', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: SIG
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDO_O01.ORDER']['RDO_O01.ORDER_DETAIL']['RXO']['RXO.14']['CN.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('SIG', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: qty
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXO']['RXO.11'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('qty', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: numofrefills
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXO']['RXO.13'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('numofrefills', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: route
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RDE_O01.OBSERVATION']['RXR']['RXR.1']['CE.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('route', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugien
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXO']['RXO.2']['RXO.2.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugien', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderdatetime
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.9'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderdatetime', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugid
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXO']['RXO.2']['RXO.2.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugid', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: dispunits
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDO_O01.ORDER']['RDO_O01.ORDER_DETAIL']['RXO']['RXO.4']['CE.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('dispunits', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: dosage
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXO']['RXO.2'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('dosage', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugcodingsystem
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXO']['RXO.2']['RXO.2.3'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugcodingsystem', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: ordernumber
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.2']['EI.1'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('ordernumber', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: perscriptionnumber
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = ""; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('perscriptionnumber', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugNDC
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RDE_O01.OBSERVATION']['NTE']['NTE.3'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugNDC', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovfirstname
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.3']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovfirstname', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovlastname
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.2']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovlastname', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovmiddlename
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.4']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovmiddlename', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovfsuffix
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.5']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovfsuffix', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: orderingprovid
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.12']['ORC.12.1']; }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('orderingprovid', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: ordereffectivedatetime
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['ORC']['ORC.15'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('ordereffectivedatetime', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.name: drugname
com.webreach.mirth.model.Step.script: var mapping;try { mapping = msg['RDE_O01.ORDER']['RXO']['RXO.1']['RXO.1.2'].toString(); }catch (e) { logger.error(e); mapping = '';}channelMap.put('drugname', validate( mapping , '', new Array()));

transformer.inboundTemplate: MSH^\|~&^CHCS\ORE^F3753^DATAGATE^3M^20070312143210^^ORM\O01^F1355-572866^P^2.3^ PID^1^^81414\\F3753^20/612-00-0073^KELLY\DARRELL\L II^^19790613^M^^^73 BIRCH TREE LN\\GOLDSBORO\NC\27532^^^166.966.4777^^^^^612-00-0073^^^^^^^^4007\USAF ACTIVE DUTY\99PAT\F11\\99PTC^ ORC^NW^070312-00008\CHCSM^^51482\CHCSM^^^1\&@amp@\D5\20070312153200\20070317153100\ROUTINE\^^20070312143200^4941\BAD\SIX\\\\\99USR^^1\BAD\SIX\\\\\99STF^1621\GYN MTF\99HOS\1\SEYMOUR JOHNSON AFB, NC\99DIV^ RXO^4332\HYDROQUINONE USP, 4% CREAM--TOP CREA\99PSD\00187-0394-31\ELDOQUIN FORTE 4% CREAM\NDC^4^^%^10\CREAM^T2 BID F5 RF0^TAKE TWO TWICE A DAY FOR 5 DAYS ^^^^1^^0^Provider DEA Number\Prov Fam. Name\Given\MI^Pharm Id\Family\Given\MI RXR^17\TOP^ ZOR^9^^^^^^^^Y^^^^3\PROVIDER ORDER ENTER\99PSI^^^^^^^^^^\436\BCBA\99MEP^

com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
com.webreach.mirth.model.Channel.postprocessingScript: // This script executes once after a message has been processed return;
